title: Andreas Seidel
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809064117/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809064117/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Andreas Seidel**

1975: born in Bad Saarow (near Berlin, [Germany](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809064117/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Germany))  
1994–1998: study of economics  
since 2000: freelance graphic designer & illustrator  
2003: launches [astype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809064117/http:/typophile.com/wiki/astype) foundry to release his typefaces  
2006: launches [German Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809064117/http:/typophile.com/wiki/German%20Type%20Foundry) together with [Ingo Preuss](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809064117/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ingo%20Preuss)
author: andreas
